global_suffix: pixel art, 16-bit SNES style, top-down RPG perspective, isolated character on plain white background, no ground no shadows no gradients, clean pixel edges, vibrant colors, game sprite

prompts.prompt: 32x32 pixel sprite sheet, 8 frames, horizontal strip, plain white background, no shadows, no gradients, no ground. 3/4 top-down view, 16-bit SNES RPG style. Character: A cute brindle black French Bulldog puppy with white chest patch, big bat ears pointing up, short stocky body, stubby tail, wearing a small brown leather collar. Animation: Idle breathing cycle. Frame 1: Standing alert. Frame 2: Slight ear twitch. Frame 3: Chest rises (inhale). Frame 4: Ears perk. Frame 5: Chest falls (exhale). Frame 6: Tail wag. Frame 7: Head tilt. Frame 8: Return to start.
